If Jagex do look at the reports sent in, if you want to annoy them, gather an army of people to use this script, and they will have 100s of reports to look through.

item.title: Ban Me!
item.dc:creator: @R1ch4y R1ch4y
item.description:
@R1ch4y wrote:

This is just a script that I made for some fun.

If you place a character in a busy place, and leave it, in a few minutes you should be banned/muted.

It’s just for some fun. I was thinking that we could have a competition; Who can get banned the fasted?

[size=25pt]THIS SCRIPT WILL GET YOU BANNED/MUTED!
USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!
YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED![/size]

Script:

[code]program BanMe;

//By R1ch4, of GzP, and SRL, Mopar and now Freddy.

procedure Typing;

begin

SendKeys(‘I like to auto!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Autoing rules! Everyone should try it!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Double your items!: Drop them then press Alt + F4!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Give me Mith armour and up to get it trimmed!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Go to freewebs.(0m/rscapegp4u4free for free stuff!!!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Message me ur pass for free money!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Change your pass to iwantgp for 100m!!!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘All log off now or I will ban u!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘I am an undercover member of Jagex staff.’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Im gonna ban all u noobs!!!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Sellin lvl 93 acc $100 great bargain!!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Buyin lvl 100+ acc with U.S dollar! Max $150!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Everyone should now get a bot and auto. Try it!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘i h8 all these ads. good job i hav an advert blocker!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me!’ + Chr(13));
Wait(2000);
SendKeys(‘Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me! Ban Me!’ + Chr(13));

end;

procedure Clicking;

ClickMouse(540,188,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(579,186,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(607,185,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(641,188,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(669,195,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(702,189,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(735,185,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(540,188,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(579,186,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(607,185,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(641,188,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(669,195,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(702,189,True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(735,185,True);
Wait(250);

begin
repeat

Typing;
Clicking;

until(false);

end.[/code]

Enjoy!
